items.sentence: Tom is good at getting people to do things for him.
Tom opened the drawer again and took out a notepad.
Tom said that he was too tired to do anything else.
Tom said that you need to be here all day tomorrow.
I forgot to tell Tom and Mary to bring their lunch.
I can\'t believe that I didn\'t even think of that.
I can\'t believe you\'re capable of harming anyone.
I think that Tom doesn\'t know how to speak French.
Aren\'t you still planning on going back to Boston?
Assuming this thing actually works, we\'ll be rich.
Tom couldn\'t afford to pay somebody else to do it.
Neither Tom nor Mary has gone fishing this weekend.
Please hand in your papers by the end of the month.
Tom didn\'t know that Mary was going to be so busy.
Tom thought Mary wasn\'t going to get into college.
Tom told Mary she shouldn\'t do what she was doing.
Tom has some good ideas he wants to tell you about.
Tom laughed before he realized Mary wasn\'t joking.
Have you ever heard of a custom as strange as this?
I don\'t think that Tom has time today to help you.
